docs.text: event and signal-slot framework 以下是个人对QT中的事件event和信号槽(signal/slog)的理解, 未必正确, 仅供个人参考. ---------------------------------------------------------- 对用户操作做出的响应事件 or 系统自动发出的事件 (如点击操作) (如定时器) ---------------------------------------------------------- || \/ ----------------------- 创建事件对象 ----------------------- || \/ --------------------------------- 被事件过滤器过滤 === 1 例如在包含窗口中过载eventFilter --------------------------------- || \/ ---------------------------- 事件分发之前可以自定义行为 通过过载event() 比如改变tab键组件,或添加 === 2 自定义事件 ---------------------------- || \/ ----------------------------------------- 将event对象传递给QObject的event函数 event函数按照事件类型分发给事件处理函数 ---------------------------------------- || or || \/ \/ ---------- ---------- 事件队列 直接处理 ---------- ---------- \ / -------------------- 对应的事件处理函数 === 3 -------------------- || \/ ---------------------- 有可能发出信号signal === 4 ---------------------- || \/ ---------------------- 立即执行对应的槽钩子 ---------------------- 如上图所示 如果使用组件的默认事件, 直接定义signal/slot - p4 如果自定义组件行为, 在自定义组件中载父类同名事件处理函数, 有可能直接调用父类中函数默认行为. 例如mouseMoveEvent/mousePressEvent/mouseReleaseEvent - p3 在窗口关闭时, 如果改变关闭时的默认行为, 事件处理函数中需要调用accept()或者ignore() - p3 过载event时, 不是修改默认事件处理函数, 而是在事件分发之前协调事件或者添加自定义事件 - p2 在父类中重写eventFilter, 在自身中通过installEventFilte把自身安装到父类事件过滤器中, 处理事件时就会先被过滤器过滤一遍, 例如某些组件不处理某些消息 - p1

docs.text: Hello World Create Qt Widgets Application with QWidget as base class (disable Generate form ) Codes In hellowrld.h #ifndef HELLOWORLD_H #define HELLOWORLD_H #include QWidget #include QLabel #include QPushButton #include QHBoxLayout class HelloWorld : public QWidget { Q_OBJECT public: HelloWorld(QWidget *parent = 0); ~HelloWorld(); private: QLabel *pLabel; QPushButton * pBtn; QHBoxLayout *pLayout; }; #endif // HELLOWORLD_ In helloworld.cpp #include helloworld.h HelloWorld::HelloWorld(QWidget *parent) : QWidget(parent) { pLabel = new QLabel(tr( Hello World! )); pBtn = new QPushButton(tr( Exit )); pLayout = new QHBoxLayout(this); pLayout- addWidget(pLabel); pLayout- addWidget(pBtn); connect(pBtn, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(close())); // signal-slot setLayout(pLayout); setFixedSize(200, 100); setWindowTitle(tr( My Hello World )); } HelloWorld::~HelloWorld() { } In main.cpp #include helloworld.h #include QApplication int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { QApplication a(argc, argv); HelloWorld w; w.show(); return a.exec(); }

install tools apt-get install qttools5-dev-tools how to edit pro file to your project, add line: TRANSLATIONS += mymainwind.ts edit codes to translate int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { QApplication a(argc, argv); QTranslator qtTranslator; qtTranslator.load( qt_ + QLocale::system().name(), QLibraryInfo::location(QLibraryInfo::TranslationsPath)); a.installTranslator( qtTranslator); QTranslator myappTranslator; myappTranslator.load( mymainwind ); a.installTranslator( myappTranslator); MainWindow w; w.show(); return a.exec(); } Important: If you want to translate string out of function, you will use QT_TR_NOOP to translate one string, and QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP to more strings. You can install some builtin translations, for example: 5.12.0/gcc_64/translations/qt_zh_CN.qm enter your project folder, exec lupdate mymainwind.pro to generate mymainwind.ts myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ lupdate -verbose mymainwind.pro Updating 'mymainwind.ts'... Found 20 source text(s) (0 new and 20 already existing) myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ exec linguist mymainwind.ts to translate in linguist tool edit your translation, for example: Open - 打开( O) Click File - Release then Save in linguist tool to generate mymainwind.qm copy mymainwind.qm to application folder run your application, you will see the results

qtchooser === qmake link to qtchooser myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ qtchooser --print-env === print env for qtchooser QT_SELECT= default QTTOOLDIR= /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/bin QTLIBDIR= /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ find /usr/ | grep qtchooser === find conf for qtchooser /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt-default/qtchooser /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt-default/qtchooser/default.conf === /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qtchooser /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qtchooser/qt4.conf /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qtchooser/4.conf /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qtchooser/qt5.conf /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qtchooser/5.conf /usr/share/lintian/overrides/qtchooser /usr/share/man/man1/qtchooser.1.gz /usr/share/doc/qtchooser /usr/share/doc/qtchooser/copyright /usr/share/doc/qtchooser/README.Debian /usr/share/doc/qtchooser/changelog.Debian.gz /usr/share/qtchooser /usr/share/qtchooser/qt5-x86_64-linux-gnu.conf /usr/share/qtchooser/qt4-x86_64-linux-gnu.conf /usr/bin/qtchooser myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ cat /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt-default/qtchooser/default.conf /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/bin /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ su Password: root@mypcname:/home/myusername/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind# vim /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt-default/qtchooser/default.conf root@mypcname:/home/myusername/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind# exit myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ cat /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt-default/qtchooser/default.conf === modify /home/myusername/.Qtinstall/5.12.0/gcc_64/bin /home/myusername/.Qtinstall/5.12.0 myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$

docs.text: apt-get install qttools5-dev-tools
docs.title: install tools
edit pro file to your project, add line: TRANSLATIONS += mymainwind.ts

docs.text: int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { QApplication a(argc, argv); QTranslator qtTranslator; qtTranslator.load( qt_ + QLocale::system().name(), QLibraryInfo::location(QLibraryInfo::TranslationsPath)); a.installTranslator( qtTranslator); QTranslator myappTranslator; myappTranslator.load( mymainwind ); a.installTranslator( myappTranslator); MainWindow w; w.show(); return a.exec(); } Important: If you want to translate string out of function, you will use QT_TR_NOOP to translate one string, and QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP to more strings. You can install some builtin translations, for example: 5.12.0/gcc_64/translations/qt_zh_CN.qm

docs.text: myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$ lupdate -verbose mymainwind.pro Updating 'mymainwind.ts'... Found 20 source text(s) (0 new and 20 already existing) myusername@mypcname:~/a/codes/qtproj/mymainwind$
docs.title: enter your project folder, exec lupdate mymainwind.pro to generate mymainwind.ts
exec linguist mymainwind.ts to translate in linguist tool
edit your translation, for example: &Open -> 打开(&O)
Click File->Release then Save in linguist tool to generate mymainwind.qm
run your application, you will see the results
